lead_paragraph: The Global Economic Prospects report predicted an improvement in the United States economy but stagnation in Europe and a slowdown in China.
snippet: The Global Economic Prospects report predicted an improvement in the United States economy but stagnation in Europe and a slowdown in China.

headline.main: World Bank Lowers Expectations for Global Growth in 2015
headline.print_headline: World Bank Lowers Expectations for Global Growth in 2015
